name: Molehill Mountain
description:
Go fullscreen for the best experience

Thanks for playing!

Controls:

Move with the arrow keys

Jump with 'X'

Attack with 'C'

Warnings:

If you phase through the ground in the beginning restart the game.

Moving a  little as you fall seems to help. I'm not sure why.

Sorry about that.
